job.description: pstrongTITLE Data ScientistMachine Learning EngineerstrongppstrongLOCATION RemotestrongppstrongDuration 8 months extensions strongppbrppnbspIdeal Qualificationsstrongstrongpulli5 Python software development for composition and modularity debugging and following tracebacksliliStrong stats background and concepts including hypothesis testing correlation R squared PvalueliliExperience with Pandas NumPy SciPy Pytorch liliTensorflow functional API deep learningliliMathematics of machine learning linear algebra multivariable calculus liliSQL querying liliHyperparameter optimization regularizing regression models liulpbrppNice to HavepulliMasters or PhD HIGHLY preferred liliEcommerce experience liulpnbspppnbspnbspppOur client is looking for a Data ScientistMachine Learning Engineer to sit remotely within the USnbspWe follow industry standard practices for managing collaboration deployment and testingnbspWe deploy and interact with resources on AWSnbspppResponsibilities includepp Analyze large data sets by quantifying the data quality identifying particular patterns and visualizing results pp Understand business problems and identify the right data sets and MLStatistical approach to produce the desired outcomes pp Adapt to account for changes and be able to propose alternative approaches pp Ideate and develop analytics and modeling solutions crossfunctionally to build customized longterm and sustainable solutions pp Provide critical thought leadership and enhance organizational capabilities pp Own machine learning pipelines endtoend pp Write productiongrade machine learning code using standard engineering practices and deploy models to production pp Improve codebase and leadparticipate in code reviews with Research Scientists and Data Scientists pp Help nonengineers develop their engineering skills pp Mentor junior team members and contribute to a culture where everyone is valuedp
